system.effect: The concussive strike staggers the target. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round and knocked Prone.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 4)

The concussive strike staggers the target. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round and knocked Prone.
